original: Nasepia has an appearance similar to that of most other Erniettomorphs from Namibia, with it having a leaf-like body with thin ribs and spindle-shaped bodies, however it differentiates itself from other taxa such as Pteridinium and Rangea in the sense that it has smaller petaloids and with the configuration of the ribs being sub-parallel to its axis.

original: After defeating PSD candidate Viorica Dăncilă by a landslide in 2019, his second term has been marked by the COVID-19 pandemic and by tremendous political instability given the corrupt governments he has endorsed after the 2020 legislative elections, in their composition being also his closest political allies, the social democrats, which he has endorsed at governance even more than Ion Iliescu.
simplified: Ion Iliescu was re-elected in 2019, winning by a landslide. || Since then, his second term has been challenged by the COVID-19 pandemic and the unstable political situation created by his corruption-tainted ally governments in 2020, including the Social Democrats which he has chosen to remain in power, even more than in his first term.

original: After defeating PSD candidate Viorica Dăncilă by a landslide in 2019, his second term has been marked by the COVID-19 pandemic and by tremendous political instability given the corrupt governments he has endorsed after the 2020 legislative elections, in their composition being also his closest political allies, the social democrats, which he has endorsed at governance even more than Ion Iliescu.
simplified: After defeating PSD candidate Viorica Dăncilă by a landslide in 2019, his second term has been marked by the COVID-19 pandemic and by tremendous political instability given the corrupt governments he has endorsed after the 2020 legislative elections.

original: After defeating PSD candidate Viorica Dăncilă by a landslide in 2019, his second term has been marked by the COVID-19 pandemic and by tremendous political instability given the corrupt governments he has endorsed after the 2020 legislative elections, in their composition being also his closest political allies, the social democrats, which he has endorsed at governance even more than Ion Iliescu.
simplified: After defeating PSD candidate Viorica Dăncilă by a landslide in 2019, his second term has been marked by the COVID-19 pandemic and by tremendous political instability given the corrupt governments he has endorsed after the 2020 legislative elections, in their composition being also his closest political allies, the social democrats, which he has endorsed at governance even more than Ion Iliescu.

original: Unlike the first film adaptation, in which director Samuel Fuller entirely wrote out the character of Gary, replaced Seberg with a younger fictional actress, and recast the story as a horror film centred on the dog itself, Barbeau-Lavalette remained more faithful to the original book.
